Package org.soen6441.controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
org.soen6441.controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
The Player Controller class controls the activities of all the players at once.

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfRounds

      public int getNumberOfRounds()

    • getSaved

      public boolean getSaved()

    • playerIssueOrder

      public void playerIssueOrder()
      The player_issue_order method asks each player to issue an order in a round robin fashion and they are added to the order list of that player. The loop terminates when all the human player enter the keyword "quit". If the match consists of all AI players then each of them issues only one order. The acknowledgement are passed on to the view.

    • editPlayer

      public java.lang.String editPlayer​(java.lang.String p_Command, java.lang.String p_Str) throws java.lang.Exception

      this Method will take inputs from the user and will add or remove player according to the inputs provided by the user

      Parameters:
      p_Command - this is command entered by the player
      p_Str - this is name entered by the player in the command prompt
      Returns:
      l_ReturnString returns string acknowledgement based on the added or removed players
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - this is user defined exception based on the add player or remove player method

    • playerNextOrder

      public void playerNextOrder()
      This method iterates till the player list doesn't becomes empty. This means all the orders of all the players are executed. It works in a round robin fashion. All the players execute there orders one by one. The player who's all orders are executed is removed from the list. The player who has won a battle in this round is assigned a card. All the players' negotiated players list is made empty. At the end of this round, we check if a player is declared as a winner.

    • removePlayerWithNoCountry

      public void removePlayerWithNoCountry()
      This method is used to remove the player with no countries on its name.

    • clearNegotiatedPlayerList

      public void clearNegotiatedPlayerList()
      This method is used to clear all the individual players' negotiated players list after each round of issuing and execution of orders.

    • checkTheWinner

      public void checkTheWinner()
      This method is used to check if one player owns all the countries of the map and hence can be declared as the winner of the game.

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      This is the getter method of providing winner player
      Returns:
      The player who won the game.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner​(Player p_Winner)
      The setter method to set the player as winner of the game.
      Parameters:
      p_Winner - The player who won the game.
